rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ontosoft is an ontology to describe software
rdf:Description.terms:description: Ontosoft is an ontology to describe software.
rdf:Description.terms:title: The Ontosoft ontology

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Statistics about software use (downloads, frequency of use, etc)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Usage Statistics

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Details about implementation of the code (parallelization, etc)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Implementation Details

rdf:Description.dc:description: How is the software being developed or maintained ?
What is the URL for the citation ?

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A version of a piece of software described by ontosoft
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Software Version

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Describes use of the software with other software in a workflow
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Workflow Description

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A text based identifier
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Identifier

rdf:Description.dc:description: What language(s) is the software written in ?
Do you have any test data for the software ?

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Used for citing publications with citation next and a citation location
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Citation

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Comma separated keywords associated with the software
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Keywords

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property annotation provides UI specific information for the property like positioning, special UI interface, etc

rdf:Description.dc:description: Are there any relevant data catalogs that can be used with this software ?
Are there any memory requirements for this software ?

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Information about uses of this software (paper dois, research labs, etc)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Usage Information

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Category of software metadata properties

rdf:Description.dc:description: What is the URL for the executable ?
What other software can interoperate with this one?
Can you describe the test data ?

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates a parameter used by a software
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Parameter

rdf:Description.dc:description: What is the DOI or any other unique identifier for this software (or software version) ?
What is the File I/O type ?
Are there any other important details about the implementation of this code (parallelization, special hardware, etc) ?

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Description of how the software is used, and any assumptions made for using the software
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Uses and Assumptions

rdf:Description.dc:description: What are the input parameters used for this software?

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property annotation indicates if a property is a required property or not
An entity composed of multiple entities
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Complex Entity

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Information about any on-line resource for accessing the software community (Mailing-list, discussion board, wiki, etc)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Community Information

rdf:Description.dc:description: What is the software called ?
Is there a project website for the software ?

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of programming languages
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Programming Language

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An entity that provides enumeration instances
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Enumeration Entity

rdf:Description.dc:description: What license is the code released under ?

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A numeric entity
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Numeric Entity

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A class of licenses that the software is released under
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: License

rdf:Description.dc:description: Is this software typically used with other software in a workflow ? (eg: for visualization, preprocessing, postprocessing, etc)
What are the recommended uses and assumptions for the software ?
What are the domain specific keywords for this software
Describe the workflow ?
What is the text associated with the Citation ?

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A numeric value with units
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Measurement Entity

rdf:Description.dc:description: What is the id for the File I/O ?
What output files does the software produce ?
How can one install the software ?

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Text associated with a citation
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Citation Text

rdf:Description.dc:description: Would you like to provide a short description for this software ?
When was this version released ?
What is the software version id ?
What software can this software be composed with in a workflow ?

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: PROV is the W3C standard for provenance.

rdf:Description.dc:description: Are there any major contributors of note for this software ?
What version does this software version supersede ?

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates a file based input to, or file based output from a software
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: File I/O

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Describes composition of a software with others in a workflow
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Composition

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Location URL
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Location

rdf:Description.dc:description: Is there any benchmark information about the software ?
What are the general categories (keywords, labels) associated with the software ?

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Description of the Test Data provided
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: TestData Description

rdf:Description.dc:description: Is there any on-line resource for accessing the software community ? (eg. Mailing-list, discussion board, wiki, etc)
What is the e-mail contact for this software?
Who created this software? (Project, Organization, Person, Initiative, etc.)
What is the URL for the code ?

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A software can be tagged with multiple categories. Multiple instances can be created of this, and it can also be subclassed to have hierarchical categories
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: SoftwareCategory

rdf:Description.dc:description: Are there any statistics ?

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Instructions on how to run the test with the provided test data including test cases, setup instructions, etc.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Test Instructions

rdf:Description.dc:description: Has the software been adopted in a project, organization or by a person?

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Software is any piece of code that is described in Ontosoft. This could some visualisation software, software package, library, componentised scripts, etc. This can be subclassed if software categories with extra properties are required, otherwise one should use SoftwareTag to categorise software.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Software

rdf:Description.dc:description: What other software does the software require to be installed ?

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: TestData is used to describe test datasets for the software
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Test Data

rdf:Description.dc:description: Is there any on-line documentation about the software ?
Which versions replace the current version?
How can a user get support for the software ? (eg. Report bugs, request features and extensions, etc)

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Person identifier class
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Person

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A text entity
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Text Entity

rdf:Description.dc:description: A date entity
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Date Entity

rdf:Description.dc:description: What other useful features of this software are worth highlighting ?

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Constraints on use of the software, any simplifications, situations it isn't designed for
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Use Limitations

rdf:Description.dc:description: What input files does the software require ?
What Operating Systems can the software run on ?

rdf:Description.rdfs:description: Are there any publications where the software is used ?

rdf:Description.dc:description: Who is the publisher of this software?
Provide a Twitter handle, ORCID Id, email address, github URL, home page, or any other unique identifier for this person
Is there any information about uses of this software (paper dois, research labs, etc) ?

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property annotation provides information to be handed over to search engines (like Solr) to explain how to tokenize and index the property values

rdf:Description.dc:description: Do you know how long it takes to run this software on average ?
What versions does the software have ?

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The Dublin Core terms are commonly used by the community to describe basic attribution metadata
Software development/maintenance description
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Development Information

rdf:Description.dc:description: What are the ratings for this software?

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An informal text-based description of software
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Software Description

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Operating Systems that the software runs on
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Operating System

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Rating of a software
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Rating

rdf:Description.dc:description: Is there a preferred publication or citation for this software ?
What are the funding sources for this software?
What is the URL for test data ?
What is the support offered for this software?

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Software benchmarking information
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Benchmark Information

rdf:Description.dc:description: Are there any specific instructions for testing the software ?
Are there any constraints on use, situations it is not designed for, simplifications ?
Is there any other similar software that you know of ?
